name: Jerry vs The Scribbles of DOOM
name_original: Jerry vs The Scribbles of DOOM
description:
Submission

Submitted for the (Dallas) Society of Play InspireJam (2022).
Inspirations: Seinfeld, Regular Show (nonchalant reaction to magic), Castle Crashers (or any 2d beat-em-up)

Modifiers used: 

  • "Stranger in a Strange Land" - The Seinfeld cast fight magical beings in New York.
  • "Touch Grass" - A television show from the 90s.
  • "Invert Your Expectations" - Something like this existing.

Info

The cast of Jerry from the hit pilot 'Jerry' from the hit show 'Seinfeld' duke it out with a mad Warlock  and his scribbles  and themselves . Download and read the script for the story.

This is a Local Co-Op Beat-Em-Up with a Co-Op mode (1-4 players) & a versus mode (2-4 players).

Parsec is recommended for playing with others.
